trans-unit.resname: PPC1·1 | Garruk the Slayer | Card Name
PPC1·1 | Garruk the Slayer | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [0]: Put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 0：将一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PPC1·1 | Garruk the Slayer | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+4]: Target Wolf creature gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +4：直到回合结束，目标狼生物得+1/+0且获得死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: PPC1·1 | Garruk the Slayer | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−10]: Destroy target creature. Put loyalty counters on Garruk the Slayer equal to that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: -10：消灭目标生物。在凶徒贾路上放置等同于该生物防御力的忠诚指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PPC1·1 | Garruk the Slayer | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−25]: Destroy all creatures Garruk the Slayer doesn't control.
trans-unit.target: -25：消灭所有不由凶徒贾路操控的生物。
